kun reading compounds: 儘【まま】as it is, as one likes, because, as, condition, state, sic, sic erat scriptum, the quoted matter has been transcribed exactly as found in the source text
儘ならない【ままならない】unable to have one's way with
気まま【きまま】willful, wilful, selfish, self-centered, egoistic, carefree, do-as-you-please, freewheeling, free spirited
言われるがまま【いわれるがまま】(doing) as one is told
